# CVeetje - Complete Documentation for LLMs

## Overview

CVeetje is a Dutch AI-powered CV (resume) and motivation letter generator. The name "CVeetje" is a Dutch diminutive meaning "little CV", reflecting the friendly and accessible nature of the product.

## Mission

To help Dutch job seekers create professional, tailored CVs and motivation letters quickly and affordably using AI technology.

## Target Audience

- Job seekers in the Netherlands and Belgium
- Professionals updating their CV for new opportunities
- Students entering the job market
- Career changers needing multiple CV versions

## Core Features

### 1. LinkedIn Profile Import
- Users can paste their LinkedIn profile text directly
- Alternatively, users can upload screenshots of their LinkedIn profile
- AI parses the content to extract structured data:
  - Personal information (name, location, contact)
  - Work experience (company, role, dates, descriptions)
  - Education (institution, degree, dates)
  - Skills (technical and soft skills)
  - Languages
  - Certifications

### 2. Job Vacancy Analysis
- Users paste the job vacancy text
- AI extracts:
  - Company name
  - Job title
  - Required skills
  - Responsibilities
  - Qualifications
  - Company culture indicators

### 3. AI Style Generation
- Generates unique visual styles based on:
  - Industry (tech, finance, healthcare, creative, etc.)
  - Role level (junior, senior, executive)
  - User preferences (conservative to experimental)
- Style includes:
  - Color palette (primary, secondary, accent)
  - Typography (heading and body fonts)
  - Layout structure
  - Header design
  - Skill display format

### 4. CV Content Generation
- AI writes optimized content sections:
  - Professional summary tailored to the job
  - Experience descriptions with relevant achievements
  - Skills section highlighting matching competencies
  - Education with relevant details
- Keyword optimization for ATS (Applicant Tracking Systems)

### 5. Motivation Letter Generator
- Creates personalized motivation letters based on:
  - The generated CV content
  - The job vacancy requirements
  - User's personal motivation (optional input)
- Available in multiple tones (formal, friendly, confident)
- Export as PDF or Word document

### 6. Live Preview & Editor
- WYSIWYG preview of the CV
- Real-time editing capabilities
- Element hiding/showing
- Color customization
- Font adjustments

### 7. Profile Management
- Save multiple LinkedIn profiles
- Quick switching between profiles
- Profile photos stored securely
- Reuse profiles for different job applications

## Technical Architecture

### Frontend
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- React 19 with Server Components
- Tailwind CSS 4 for styling
- Radix UI for accessible components
- TypeScript for type safety

### Backend
- Next.js API Routes
- Firebase Admin SDK for server operations
- Puppeteer with Chromium for PDF generation

### Database
- Firebase Firestore for data storage
- Collections:
  - users (user profiles, API keys, credits)
  - users/{userId}/cvs (generated CVs)
  - users/{userId}/transactions (credit history)

### Authentication
- Firebase Authentication
- Email/password sign-in
- Secure session management

### AI Integration
- Supports multiple LLM providers:
  - OpenAI (GPT-4, GPT-4 Turbo)
  - Anthropic (Claude 3 Opus, Sonnet, Haiku)
  - Google (Gemini Pro, Gemini Flash)
- Users provide their own API keys
- Keys encrypted before storage

### Payments
- Mollie payment provider
- Supports: iDEAL, credit card, Bancontact, etc.
- Credit-based system (1 credit = 1 PDF download)

### Infrastructure
- Google Cloud Run for hosting
- Google Artifact Registry for Docker images
- Cloud Build for CI/CD
- Firebase Storage for file uploads

## API Endpoints

### Authentication Required
All /api/* routes require Firebase authentication.

### CV Operations
- POST /api/cv/generate - Generate CV content
- POST /api/cv/style - Generate CV styling
- GET /api/cv/[id]/preview-html - Get CV HTML preview
- GET /api/cv/[id]/pdf - Generate and download PDF

### Motivation Letter
- POST /api/cv/[id]/motivation - Generate motivation letter
- GET /api/cv/[id]/motivation/download - Download as PDF/DOCX

### Profile Operations
- POST /api/linkedin/parse - Parse LinkedIn text
- POST /api/profile/parse - Parse profile from screenshots
- GET /api/profiles - List saved profiles
- POST /api/profiles - Save new profile

### Settings
- POST /api/settings/api-key - Save encrypted API key
- GET /api/models - List available AI models

### Payments
- POST /api/mollie/checkout - Create payment session
- POST /api/mollie/webhook - Handle payment webhooks

## Data Privacy

- User data stored in Firebase (EU region)
- API keys encrypted with AES-256
- No data shared with third parties
- Users can delete their data at any time
- GDPR compliant
